name: Pisces (Little Fish)
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to the children born under the sign of Pisces.
averseDescription: Obverse: above there is the Small Coat of Arms of Ukraine with the semicircular inscription НАЦІОНАЛЬНИЙ БАНК УКРАЇНИ (National Bank of Ukraine); below there is the coin face value ДВІ ГРИВНІ (two hryvnias) under the conventionalized composition - against the background of the sky of stars there are the images of Zodiac signs with the child that is enjoying a balmy sleep thereunder; the coin issue year indication 2015 and the mark of the National Bank of Ukraine Mint are to the right, while to the left there is the indication of metal, its fineness and weight Ag 925/7,78.
reverseDescription: Reverse bears the conventionalized composition: to the left, on the lusterless surface, there is the sign of Pisces; in the center there are depicted two fishes; above there is the inscription РИБКИ (little fishes).
